docblock.description: This class should be extended by every other WPBA class.
docblock.long-description: All of the setup logic should be contained here.

docblock.description: Enqueues scripts and styles for use on the public front end.
Enqueues scripts and styles for use in wp-admin.
This class contains any sort of helper methods/properties that should be shared throughout the classes.
docblock.long-description: This class should be extended by all other classes except WP_Better_Attachments.

docblock.description: The length to cache a transient, default 24 hours.

tag.description: Optional, the length of time to store the attachments, default 24 hours.

tag.description: False if value was not set and true if value was set.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Either false on failure/does not exist or the cached attachments.
